2025-05-14.title: Trump to overhaul AI chip curbs reviled by Nvidia and US allies
2025-05-14.description: Trump administration revamps semiconductor export regulations, replacing Biden-era approach, drawing objections from US allies and tech companies.

2025-05-13.title: Nvidia to Sell Chips to Saudi AI Firm for Data Center Plan
2025-05-13.description: Nvidia Corp. will send semiconductors to Saudi Arabian artificial intelligence company Humain for a 500-megawatt data center buildout, part of a Trump administration initiative that lifts previous restrictions on shipping advanced AI capabilities to the regio…

2025-05-13.title: US Weighs Letting UAE Buy Over a Million Advanced Nvidia Chips
2025-05-13.description: The Trump administration is weighing a deal that would allow the United Arab Emirates to import more than a million advanced Nvidia Corp. chips, people familiar with the matter said, a quantity that far exceeds limits under Biden-era AI chip regulations — and…
